root.name: Scotland Yard
root.description: OverviewScotland Yard, released in 1998 by Cryo Interactive Entertainment and Ravensburger Interactive, is a strategy game based on the board game of the same name (also released by Ravensburger). The game puts several players in the roles of inspectors tasked with tracking down a mysterious criminal named Mr. X, while the other player is cast as the aforementioned villain. The inspectors are only able to see Mr. X's last move, and they must use this knowledge to surround Mr. X, thus winning the game.
